1.title: An Open Book

episode of.title: La La's Full Court Life (TV Series 2011– )

1.plot: La La's life is at its zenith right now with a career in high gear, a thriving makeup line, an adoring husband and son, and a new clothing line about to launch.

2.title: Falling Apart at the Seams

episode of.title: La La's Full Court Life (TV Series 2011– )

2.plot: La La and Jason are joining forces to launch a hot new clothing line called 5th & Mercer and there's a ton to do! Tensions reach a boiling point and their friendship is tested.

3.title: Parenthood

episode of.title: La La's Full Court Life (TV Series 2011– )

3.plot: With their careers in the spotlight and their names constantly in the news, The Anthonys do not lead a "normal" life. So when six-year-old Kiyan is invited to audition for a national ad campaign, La must decide if this exposure is too much for her son.

4.title: La La Knows Best?

episode of.title: La La's Full Court Life (TV Series 2011– )

4.plot: Having La La for a best friend comes with a ton of perks, but it also means that Po is basically forced to live a double life in public, she runs with the rich and the famous but in private she barely scrapes by in her empty Brooklyn apartment.

5.title: Met Ball

episode of.title: La La's Full Court Life (TV Series 2011– )

5.plot: La La is one of the select few who has been hand picked by Vogue's all mighty, Anna Wintour, to attend the hottest fashion event in town - the annual Met Ball gala. However, La's love for sweets means fitting into her custom made designer Zac Posen dress.

6.title: Digital Detox

episode of.title: La La's Full Court Life (TV Series 2011– )

6.plot: An on-court fight between Carmelo and another NBA player means La La's name is splashed all over the front pages, again. Addicted to her phone and obsessed over all of the stories.

7.title: Be Careful What You Wish For

episode of.title: La La's Full Court Life (TV Series 2011– )

7.plot: La's dream of being a movie start is finally coming true. She learns that her small role in the blockbuster Think Like a Man as been turned into a leading role for the sequel, Think Like A Man Too!

8.title: Nose to the Grindstone

episode of.title: La La's Full Court Life (TV Series 2011– )

8.plot: When Carmelo - who is stuck in New York - finds out that his wife, La La, is struggling with being away from home for so long, he comes to the rescue by sending a series of fun surprises and challenges her way all via the people she loves the most.

1.title: Episode #1.1

episode of.title: La La's Full Court Life (TV Series 2011– )

1.plot: With the NBA trade deadline looming, La La spends what could be her last days in Denver enjoying a visit from Kelly Rowland. The girls challenge Melo and his teammates to a bowling match.

2.title: Episode #1.2

episode of.title: La La's Full Court Life (TV Series 2011– )

2.plot: La La is back in Los Angeles to host the red carpet festivities for the Critics' Choice Awards and celebrate Kelly Rowland's 30th birthday.

3.title: Episode #1.3

episode of.title: La La's Full Court Life (TV Series 2011– )

3.plot: It's NBA All-Star weekend in Los Angeles, and with the trade deadline just a few days away La La and Carmelo Anthony are still uncertain about their future.

4.title: Episode #1.4

episode of.title: La La's Full Court Life (TV Series 2011– )

4.plot: La La's life has been turned upside down since husband Carmelo Anthony was traded to the New York Knicks. With no time to prepare for a move & left to handle the stress on her own, La La and her son Kiyan become overwhelmed.

5.title: Episode #1.5

episode of.title: La La's Full Court Life (TV Series 2011– )

5.plot: La La has had little time to adjust to her move to NY, but the newly crowned "Queen of NY" is ready to embrace the city with a whirlwind press tour including a stop by the Wendy Williams show.

6.title: Episode #1.6

episode of.title: La La's Full Court Life (TV Series 2011– )

6.plot: When reports surface that husband Carmelo Anthony has a secret baby, La La learns the hard way just how tough the gossip blogs can be.

7.title: Episode #1.7

episode of.title: La La's Full Court Life (TV Series 2011– )

7.plot: As La La begins the daunting task of finding a place to live in a city famed for its challenging real estate, she discovers a welcome distraction when close friend & rapper, Trina, shows up broken-hearted from a recent breakup.

8.title: Episode #1.8

episode of.title: La La's Full Court Life (TV Series 2011– )

8.plot: After weeks of trying to adjust to life in New York City and several failed attempts at finding a new house, La La retreats to the comfort of her Los Angeles pad to meet up with besties Serena Williams and Kelly Rowland.

9.title: Episode #1.9

episode of.title: La La's Full Court Life (TV Series 2011– )

9.plot: La La is literally sick and tired from her recent move to New York City and knows just the place to unwind and relax - the beautiful Caribbean paradise of Turks and Caicos!

10.title: The End

episode of.title: La La's Full Court Life (TV Series 2011– )

10.plot: Just as La La Anthony and husband, NBA superstar Carmelo, start to feel settled, some surprising news reminds La La that anything can happen.

1.title: Miss Trust

episode of.title: La La's Full Court Life (TV Series 2011– )

1.plot: Since surviving her husband's trade to the New York Knicks, La La Anthony is finally adjusting to life in the Big Apple, while continuing to balance motherhood, marriage and her flourishing career.

2.title: Birthday Presence

episode of.title: La La's Full Court Life (TV Series 2011– )

2.plot: Celebrity besties La La Anthony and Kelly Rowland always carve time out of their busy schedules for each other's birthdays. This year is no different - until a series of roadblocks threaten La's plans to attend Kelly's big bash.

3.title: Friend or Faux Pas

episode of.title: La La's Full Court Life (TV Series 2011– )

3.plot: Recently La has been rapidly climbing up the ladder of success, with acting roles, endorsements and an impressive roster of celebrity friends. Unfortunately for Po & Dice, their friendship with La is in danger of unraveling.

4.title: Cakes and Pains

episode of.title: La La's Full Court Life (TV Series 2011– )

4.plot: After years of auditioning and hard work, La La has finally landed a role in the hit series "Single Ladies." When she discovers that the filming dates fall during Kiyan's birthday, La is determined to impress on camera and throw her son the perfect party.

5.title: Maybe Baby

episode of.title: La La's Full Court Life (TV Series 2011– )

5.plot: With her biological clock ticking and a career that is just taking off, La La is forced to consider whether or not she wants to have another baby to add to the Anthony fold.

6.title: All Bets Are Awful

episode of.title: La La's Full Court Life (TV Series 2011– )

6.plot: Things get out of hand when La La and Po place a high-stakes bet on who can find the perfect date for their newly single pal, Dice.

7.title: Race Under Fire

episode of.title: La La's Full Court Life (TV Series 2011– )

7.plot: La La's son Kiyan brings home a school project that has La seeing race issues everywhere.

8.title: Fights, Camera, Action!

episode of.title: La La's Full Court Life (TV Series 2011– )

8.plot: The spotlight of fame becomes too much to handle for La La when an innocent photograph taken by paparazzi is turned into a salacious story on the blogs. Meanwhile, tensions rise when La's long-time friend Wiz asks for help to get a spotlight of her own.

9.title: Kiss and Makeup, Part 1

episode of.title: La La's Full Court Life (TV Series 2011– )

9.plot: Between L.A. auditions and NBA road games, hectic schedules have prevented La La and husband Carmelo Anthony from being able to spend time together for weeks.

10.title: Kiss and Makeup, Part 2

episode of.title: La La's Full Court Life (TV Series 2011– )

10.plot: After weeks of passing each other like ships in the night, a fed up La decides to blow off some steam in Miami. But amidst the fun in the sun, La begins to realize an unpleasant truth.

1.title: London Ballin

episode of.title: La La's Full Court Life (TV Series 2011– )

1.plot: When Carmelo is chosen to represent Team USA in the Summer Olympics, The Anthonys pack up and head across the pond! La La is tasked by Access Hollywood to report on the hotspots of London - a city she knows nothing about!

2.title: Global Grind

episode of.title: La La's Full Court Life (TV Series 2011– )

2.plot: La La's schedule is jam packed with work and play. She is taking full advantage of the city, hanging with celebrity friends Ludacris and Trina and still managing to plan a party to launch Motives for La La internationally!

3.title: Here Comes the Groom(S)

episode of.title: La La's Full Court Life (TV Series 2011– )

3.plot: The controversial topic of same-sex marriage is tackled when La La is invited to the wedding celebration of her stylist, Jason. With so many people against gay matrimony, will La stand up for the cause?

4.title: Kiyan Makes a Splash

episode of.title: La La's Full Court Life (TV Series 2011– )

4.plot: No matter how hard La La tries to ignore her upcoming birthday, her friends are determined to bring up the subject of aging whenever possible. But nothing can stop her son Kiyan's growing desire for independence.

5.title: Always Bet on La La

episode of.title: La La's Full Court Life (TV Series 2011– )

5.plot: Invited to host a pool party at Foxwoods Casino, gambling-obsessed La La is wary of spending too much and puts her friends in charge of keeping her away from the slots.

6.title: Carmelo's Full Court Dedication

episode of.title: La La's Full Court Life (TV Series 2011– )

6.plot: It's time for The Carmelo Anthony Foundation's annual charity event in Puerto Rico and the whole gang comes along. But a nice, simple trip becomes complicated when La tries to squeeze in a last minute audition.

7.title: La & Kelly Horse Around

episode of.title: La La's Full Court Life (TV Series 2011– )

7.plot: While Po & Dice keep themselves busy in the city, La and best friend Kelly Rowland head to the outskirts of the Hollywood Hills for a relaxing foray into nature...with disastrous results.

8.title: Fan Appreciation

episode of.title: La La's Full Court Life (TV Series 2011– )

8.plot: Grateful for reaching over two million followers on Twitter, La La decides to hold a dinner celebrating fifty of her most inspirational fans.

9.title: No Money, Mo' Problems

episode of.title: La La's Full Court Life (TV Series 2011– )

9.plot: La La's career as an actress is on the rise and her best friend Po is enjoying success as an up-and-coming music artist. But their friendship is tested when Po turns to La for support and doesn't find what she's looking for.

10.title: The Goodbye Girls

episode of.title: La La's Full Court Life (TV Series 2011– )

10.plot: Kiyan's first day of kindergarten is quickly approaching and La La is struggling with the fact that her baby is growing up. Meanwhile, Po and Dice drop a bombshell that leaves La shocked.

imdb.title: La La's Full Court Life
akas: La La's Full Court Life (United States)
plot: Chronicles Carmelo Anthony and his wife La La Vazquez's move from Denver (where Anthony was a star Nuggets forward) to Manhattan.::Anonymous
